message.content:
We must “adjust” the interest receivable balance so that if during the period the balance increased then this is shown as a reduction in cash (i.e. a “use” of cash) so that the “(Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable” appears as a negative number. In our “working‐day” the only interest‐related transactions (whose type begins with “Interest”) are as follows. (We assume that the opening balance of the interest receivable account was zero.)

Below is a list of all the “Interest …” rows with their “amount” (rounded to two decimals):

1. Interest20240101001: 443.22  
2. Interest20240102002: 443.22  
3. Interest20240103003: 441.44  
4. Interest20240104004: 439.66  
5. Interest20240105005: 416.52  
6. Interest20240106006: 416.52  
7. Interest20240107007: 389.73  
8. Interest20240108008: 388.84  
9. Interest20240109009: 388.84  
10. Interest20240110010: 383.23  
11. Interest20240111011: 383.23  
12. Interest20240112012: 383.06  
13. Interest20240113013: 380.83  
14. Interest20240114014: 371.93  
15. Interest20240115015: 371.93  
16. Interest20240116016: 371.93  
17. Interest20240117017: 363.03  
18. Interest20240118018: 363.03  
19. Interest20240119019: 363.03  
20. Interest20240120020: 363.03  
21. Interest20240121021: 361.25  
22. Interest20240122022: 361.25  
23. Interest20240123023: 361.25  
24. Interest20240124024: 359.92  
25. Interest20240125025: 359.92  
26. Interest20240126026: 359.92  
27. Interest20240127027: 359.92  
28. Interest20240128028: 351.02  
29. Interest20240129029: 351.02  
30. Interest20240130030: 351.02  
31. Interest20240131031: 324.32  
32. Interest20240201032: 318.53  
33. Interest20240202033: 318.53  
34. Interest20240203034: 300.73  
35. Interest20240204035: 300.73  
36. Interest20240205036: 274.03  

If we add these (step‐by‐step summing the 36 amounts) we get a total of approximately 13,279.61. (That is, the ending interest receivable balance is 13,279.61.)

Since an increase in an asset account is a use of cash, the cash flow statement reports an “(Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable” item as the negative of the change in the asset balance. (In this case, we assume no opening balance so that the change is the ending balance itself.) Therefore, the final item is –13,279.61.

Thus, the answer in the requested JSON format is:

{
  "solution": {"(Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable": "-13279.61"}
}
